# Edit a feature in an amendment

This article explains how to edit a feature in an amendment by creating an amendment, selecting a product, and modifying the feature details.

To edit a feature in an amendment :

1.  Create an amendment of the type, New Product or Update a Product .
2.  In the Amendment Detail section, if you are creating a New Product amendment, click \+ Add New Product & Rate Plan .
3.  Click the select product field and select the product.
4.  Click Edit for the feature you want to edit. ![EditSubProdFeatureAmend](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/4e78ba16-ab96-4dc2-9e34-a99c91608643?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..fZFoyW2lk36dloXsVtuaSQ1nd4OcQV7ku9A2SG_pAOM)
5.  On the Edit Feature dialog box, you can edit the Description and any custom fields.
6.  Click save .
